span.p: COVID-19: South Harrison to Remained Closed Until Further Notice

p.a: Beginning Monday, March 16th, be advised that the South Harrison Twp. Elementary and Kingsway Regional Schools will close to students until further notice as we continue to monitor and assess the threat this pandemic presents to our school community, as well as consult with the Gloucester County Department of Health, and Governor Murphy's decision about when students are able to return to school without risk to their health and well-being.
The Kingsway Regional and South Harrison Twp. school grounds will also be closed to the public until further notice.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Update

span.p:
Welcome to South Harrison Twp. School's website! The school is located in Gloucester County, in southern New Jersey. It is a PreK-Grade 6 school/district. South Harrison Twp. Elementary School is proud to have been chosen by the New Jersey Department of Education to participate in the Interdistrict Public School Choice Program.
Phone Number: 856-769-0855
Fax Number: 856-769-5426

hr.p: Starting with the 2019-2020 school year South Harrison Elementary School is excited to offer online registration and re-enrollment for our students and families. The parents and guardians of current and incoming students can follow the link above to find out when online registration opens and how to be ready to use the portal.

img.alt: Novel Coronavirus 2019 Information for K-12 Schools
Mercury Containment in All Purpose Room Flooring

span.strong: Woolwich Twp. Police Department assumed policing South Harrison

hr.p: On Tuesday, October 1st, the Woolwich Twp. Police Department assumed the responsibility of policing the Township of South Harrison. To see full letter from the Superintendent click here.

a.title: Go to comments for Woolwich Twp. Police Department assumed policing South Harrison
